ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] What game features would you like to see added?
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/16/2003 8:36:56 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... Definitely I would get rid of the corpse-hunting. I understand losing exp when you die, I
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/16/2003 8:36:56 AM Eastern Standard Time, suceress@... writes:

Or, if you could go back in time and change something about Everquest during
it's creation to have certain features, what would you have done
differently?


Definitely I would get rid of the corpse-hunting. I understand losing exp when you die, I think that's a good thing (well not GOOD but it makes sense) but going back to find your body to get all your stuff back just sucks. Especially when you die somewhere you can't get back to. WHY can't you ever find a necro when you need one?


"Sail to your heart's desires, and know when to drop anchor."
